column4: 1) it's mini, not netinstall (netinstall is debian) 2) re proprosed from mini - i hope not.  proposed should be used ONLY when needed, not for everything in that repo.
yes, the mini, sorry (I'm used to Debian).  And I do need to install at least eglibc from -proposed during the base system install, though yes I would rather not bring in everything.
i hope you have reported a bug.  best of luck man.
the bug is known and fixed in -proposed, which is why I want to install eglibc from -proposed
